title: Repository Structure Analysis & Project Scope
scope_statement: Build a minimal Python pendulum simulation featuring: (1) Simple pendulum physics with the nonlinear ODE theta'' = -(g/L)*sin(theta), (2) Multiple numerical integration methods (Euler, RK4, Stormer-Verlet), (3) Energy tracking and conservation analysis E = 0.5*m*L^2*omega^2 - m*g*L*cos(theta), (4) Optional damping theta'' = -(g/L)*sin(theta) - b*omega, (5) Publication-quality visualization of trajectories, phase portraits, energy evolution, and convergence studies, (6) Validation against analytical solutions (small-angle and exact elliptic-integral period).
dependencies: scipy (for elliptic integrals and reference solutions)
deliverables: pendulum.py - core simulation module with multiple integrators
